title: Finding regular players that play the game
body: I just want to play normal with people. Is there any way similar to like buying elo boosting to find players in rank but to buy players to play normals? Since the /all chat is hard to find players and especially I don't have a mic to have discord

replies.body: what u do is you go to play then lobby then click confirm and then click accept when the maatch foud comes up and u select a champion and your playin lol
/all chat gone, its to hard to find players easily
